MiniGamePackage

Class Drawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • MiniGamePackage.Drawable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Background, Sprite

    public abstract class Drawable
extends java.lang.Object
    abstract class representing a graphical area

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        clears everything that has been painted

      • paintImage

        public void paintImage(java.lang.String filename)
        paints an image (clears all previously painted stuff). Scales (and potentially distorts) the image automatically to the given space.
        Parameters:
        filename - filename of image (jpg, png, gif)

      • paintRectangle

        public void paintRectangle(int startX,
                  int startY,
                  int width,
                  int height,
                  int borderThickness,
                  int r,
                  int g,
                  int b)
        paints a rectangle
        Parameters:
        startX - x coordinate of upper left corner
        startY - y coordinate of upper left corner
        width - width of rectangle
        height - height of rectangle
        borderThickness - thickness of the rectangle's border -1 means filled, border is included in the rectangle's size!
        r - red component of rectangle color
        g - green component of rectangle color
        b - blue component of rectangle color

      • paintPolygon

        public void paintPolygon(java.awt.Polygon polygon,
                boolean filled,
                int r,
                int g,
                int b)
        paints a polygon
        Parameters:
        polygon - the polygon
        filled - if true, a filled polygon will be painted
        r - red component of the polygons's color
        g - green component of the polygons's color
        b - blue component of the polygons's color

      • paintLine

        public void paintLine(int startX,
             int startY,
             int endX,
             int endY,
             int r,
             int g,
             int b)
        paints a line
        Parameters:
        startX - x coordinate of the line's start point
        startY - y coordinate of the line's start point
        endX - x coordinate of the line's end point
        endY - y coordinate of the line's end point
        r - red component of the line's color
        g - green component of the line's color
        b - blue component of the line's color

      • paintEllipse

        public void paintEllipse(int startX,
                int startY,
                int width,
                int height,
                int borderThickness,
                int r,
                int g,
                int b)
        paints an ellipse
        Parameters:
        startX - x coordinate of upper left corner
        startY - y coordinate of upper left corner
        width - width of ellipse
        height - height of ellipse
        borderThickness - thickness of the ellipse's border -1 means filled, border is included in the ellipse's size!
        r - red component of ellipse color
        g - green component of ellipse color
        b - blue component of ellipse color
